entries.name: fetcher()
entries.desc: Default fetcher instance.  Use this instead of ::new to reduce object allocation.

entries.name: new(sources = nil)
entries.desc: Creates a new SpecFetcher.  Ordinarily you want to use the default fetcher from ::fetcher which uses the Gem.sources.

entries.name: available_specs(type)
entries.desc: Returns a list of gems available for each source in Gem.sources.

entries.name: detect(type=:complete)
entries.desc: Return all gem name tuples who's names match obj

entries.name: search_for_dependency(dependency, matching_platform=true)
entries.desc: Find and fetch gem name tuples that match dependency.

entries.name: spec_for_dependency(dependency, matching_platform=true)
entries.desc: Find and fetch specs that match dependency.

entries.name: suggest_gems_from_name(gem_name, type = :latest)
entries.desc: Suggests gems based on the supplied gem_name. Returns an array of alternative gem names.
